name: EV-Racers
description:
Race some of the most advanced and newest electric cars around. Here you can try past versions and new concepts in the only EV only racing game.

EV-Racers is a new and revolutionary game designed to teach people about the benefits of electric cars and renewable energy. The game allows you to read about alternative energy generation, race electric cars, find out about those cars and connect to some of the worlds top EV Reviewers and news outlets.

EV-Racers goal is to change racing games forever! With almost all racing games focusing on just ICE (Internal Combustion Engine) vehicles and not talking about the consequences on the environment by using one, EV-Racers aims to change that by educating people about the good and bad with using ICE and EV's.

AMAZING CARS
Race over 15 cars and many more on the way from big and small manufacturers. You can race cars such as the Uniti One and the Tesla Roadster!

AMAZING TRACKS
Race on over 6 complex and challenging tracks with​ different difficulty levels and race types including drift and checkpoint. More tracks coming soon!

ARCADE FUN
Race in a Tesla and unlock the hidden easter eggs including Ludicrous​ mode where winning is almost guaranteed!


IMPORTANT NOTES:
This game requires iPad Mini 2 / iPad Air (Or Newer) or an iPhone 5S (Or Newer). EV-Racers can be played anywhere offline, however, a network connection is required for In-App Purchases (Coming Soon).
